ing: 1 pound smoked sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
des: "This is an EASY recipe. My son hates cabbage but will eat this like crazy. You can make it low fat by using ground turkey and low-fat sausage. They won't know the difference."
ins: Combine ground beef, smoked sausage, onion, celery, and garlic in a large stock pot over medium-high heat. Cook and stir until beef is evenly browned, about 5 minutes. Stir in cabbage, tomatoes, water, and rice. Season with garlic salt. Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low. Cover and cook, stirring once, until rice is tender, 35 to 40 minutes.
